radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse hypoattenuation of the liver compatible with steatosis; mild stranding about the head of the pancreas; unremarkable gallbladder; normal spleen and adrenal glands; right kidney normal; small bowel opacifies without obstruction or focal wall thickening; no evidence of acute bowel inflammation; mesenteric nodal mass unchanged; no hydronephrosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The mesenteric nodal mass is grossly unchanged from prior exam.
